description:
http://anidb.net/ch126378 [Satake Hirofumi] is a prisoner on death row for murdering http://anidb.net/ch126379 [his fiancée]. He`s also an "Undeadman" who has survived many desperate situations. For this, he has earned the interest of a research institution called "Human Crazy University", which studies real-life miraculous phenomena and the people who become entangled in them.
Now a subject of their research, Satake relates to them his memories of his immortal, yet unhappy, life. Why did he kill his fiancée? Soon enough, the truth sheds light on a much bigger conspiracy...
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Satake Hirofumi is a death row inmate who murdered his fiancée and her friend. His life in solitary confinement was surprisingly calm and serene. But suddenly that life comes to an end. A noose around his neck, Satake screams in fear. And the execution button is pressed...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Death Row Inmate Satake Hirofumi: The Ruthless, Cruel Man Who Slaughtered His Fiancee
L`homme cruel ayant assassiné sa fiancée
Shikeishuu: Satake Hirofumi - Kon`yakusha o Zansatsushita Reikoku Hijou no Otoko
死刑囚 佐竹博文 婚約者を惨殺した冷酷非情の男

REGULAR.description:
An ordinary, run-of-the-mill salaryman, Satake Hirofumi, goes on a cruise with his business client, Kito Joji. They spend a fun time out on the sea, but the cruiser gets destroyed when a whale crashes into it. Satake and Kito evacuate on a lifeboat, but they`re adrift alone in the Pacific ocean. Provisions and water gone, they`re on the verge of death. The only thing left in Satake`s hand was a gift from his fiancée, Negishi Chie: A lucky coin pendant.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Lucky Coin That Leads to Death: Lives Perish Adrift for 48 Days
Inochi ga Kiete Iku: Hyouryuu Yonjuuhachinichi - Shi o Maneku Kouun no Coin
La pièce chanceuse mortelle
命が消えていく 漂流48日 死を招く幸運のコイン

REGULAR.description:
Ijuin Shigeo is "Torture Sommelier," who`s versed in varieties of tortures from all ages and places. He lives in the dark and punishes abominations who escape the law. One day, a new request comes to Ijuin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goumon Sommelier: Ijuuin Shigeo - Gedou Keiji o Yaki Korosu Rengoku no Honoo
Le sommelier tortionnaire Shigeo Ijûin
The Flame of Purgatory That Burns Heinous Detectives: Torture Sommelier Ijuin Shigeo
拷問ソムリエ 伊集院茂夫 外道刑事を焼き殺す煉獄の炎
Death Row Inmate`s Girlfriend Negishi Chie: Death Awaits Wherever She Goes - Hedonistic Stalker`s Murder Impulse
La copine du condamné à mort
Shikeishuu no Koibito: Negishi Chie - Doko e Nigete mo Shi Kairaku Stalker no Satsujin Shoudou
死刑囚の恋人 根岸千恵 どこへ逃げても死快楽ストーカーの殺人衝動

REGULAR.description:
A former death row inmate, Satake Hirofumi, is being transferred to a more secure facility from Human Crazy University via a plane. But Satake is a magnet for everything that`s unlucky. Of course his plane will not land without an incident. The plane gets hijacked, the bomb on the plane explodes, and Satake is thrown out of the aircraft. From the height of 10,000 meters, he only has three minutes till he crashes to the ground. The countdown to his death begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Closed Room at 10,000 Meters in the Air: Dive of Death! Flying Casket
Le cercueil volant
Soratobu Kan`oke: Koudo 1 Man Meter no Misshitsu Shi no Dive!
空飛ぶ棺桶 高度1万メートルの密室死のダイブ!

REGULAR.description:
Thomas Plateau is a school bus driver in a rural town in Mexico. On his way home from work, Plateau helps Satake Hirofumi, an injured Asian on the street. Thanks to Plateau`s care, Satake escaped death. Interaction with local children heals Satake both physically and emotionally. But one day, Plateau`s school bus gets hijacked by a group of mafia who plans to traffick children.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: La balle de la mafia voleuse de vie
Osanaki Inochi o Ubau: Mafia no Kyoudan - Meiun Tsukita Shikeishuu no Saigo
They Took Young Lives: The Mafia`s Bullets: The Last Moment of the Doomed Death Row Inmate
幼き命を奪う マフィアの凶弾 命運尽きた死刑囚の最期

REGULAR.description:
To return to Japan, Satake Hirofumi roams around Mexico. Along the way, he meets a duo of dumb robbers, Andre and Miguel, and saves them from a bind. They call Satake "Bro" and adore him, and Satake starts living with them in the slum to make money to go home. As he gets close to the people of the slum, Satake misses home. Seeing that, Andre and Miguel take Satake to a certain place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Idiotic Duo in the Slums: The World`s Dumbest Robbers
Le cambriolage le plus grotesque au monde
Sekaiichi Manuke na Goutou: Slum ni Saku Obaka Combi
世界一マヌケな強盗 スラムに咲くおバカコンビ

REGULAR.description:
Kevin and his lover, Maria, are running away from the mafia. Maria reminds Satake of Chie, so when the two lovers are in danger, Satake rushes to help them, but instead he gets caught. Three of them are locked away in an inescapable shack. With no food or water, they get weaker as the time passes, but it was only the beginning of the tragedy. Most gruesome execution by the mafia is about to start...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai o Kurai Au Kemono-tachi: Saikyou Shokei Drug de Jinkaku Houkai
Beasts That Feeds on Love: Atrocious Punishment: Personalities Destroyed by Drugs
Des monstres nourris d`amour
愛を喰らい合う獣たち 最凶処刑ドラッグで人格崩壊

REGULAR.description:
Kito Joji, who explores the hidden lands in search of exotic food, is unexpectedly reunited with Satake Hirofumi, a guy who was supposedly executed, in Mexico. To fulfill the promise they made in the past, they take off to the next destination. There, Satake witnesses a beautiful and dreadful view that goes beyond his imagination.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Exotic Food Hunter Kito Joji: The Doomsday Lightning Strike That Claims a Friend!
Kishoku Hunter: Kitou Jouji - Tomo o Ubau Shuumatsu no Hyakurai!
Le gourmet explorateur Jôji Kitô
寄食ハンター 鬼頭丈二 友を奪う終末の百雷!

REGULAR.description:
Satake Hirofumi is reunited with his fiancé, Negishi Chie, a woman he supposedly has killed. As if to laugh at the confused Satake, a new trouble ensues: The hospital they are in gets attacked, and Satake and Chie are left in the ranging fire. To get themselves to safety, Chie takes an all-or-nothing bet. And inside the fire, Satake’s memories finally return.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: L`hôpital en feu sans issues
Nigeba Zero: Moesakaru Byouin - Jigoku no Kouka de Tomoru Kioku
Nowhere to Run: A Burning Hospital - Memories Rekindled by the Brimstone of Hell
逃げ場ゼロ 燃え盛る病院 地獄の業火で灯る記憶

REGULAR.description:
Satake Hirofumi has recovered all of his memories: He used to live a happy life with his fiancé, Negishi Chie. One day, she attends a high school reunion. But someone so dangerous is lurking in the dark, looking at her... What is the tragedy that befalls the happy couple? The shocking truth behind the incident is brought to light.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Réunion tragique
Sangeki no Dousoukai: Shikeishuu ga Umareta Hi
The Reunion of Tragedy: The Day a Death Row Inmate Was Born
惨劇の同窓会 死刑囚が生まれた日

REGULAR.description:
To save Chie, who has been kidnapped, Satake Hirofumi sets out to the roof of an abandoned building. Now that he’s a bounty head, men in Caracas are out to get him. Mafia is after him. The building suddenly collapses on him. And the lucky pendant in his neck… What did he see in his fading consciousness? The last record of Satake Hirofumi, an ordinary, run-of-the mill guy.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Former Death Row Inmate Satake Hirofumi: An Ordinary, Run-of-the-Mill Guy
L`ex-condamné à mort Hirofumi Satake
Moto Shikeishuu: Satake Hirofumi - Doko ni demo Iru Futsuu no Otoko
元死刑囚 佐竹博文 どこにでもいる普通の男

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ヒューマンバグ大学_闇の漫画

titles.title: Human Bug Daigaku
The Human Crazy University
ヒューマンバグ大学
人类毛病大学 -不死学部不幸学科-
Human Bug University
Human Defect Research Center
ヒューマンバグ大学 -不死学部不幸学科-
